text: Hello. Question about local-dev-beta: is it possible to use both local-dev (fetch/sync) along with the local HubSpot server to preview locally my work before syncing it with HubSpot Design Tools? (I've not used the local server so I might not understand it completely).

the way the local dev tool works there is no reason you couldn’t do it.

I haven’t tried yet.
Ok. I'll explore it. I'm still trying to figure out the HS workflow I will use, I'm totally new to it but come from a local dev for Wordpress (gulp webpack etc) world. Thanks for the help!

makes sense. I would say currently it makes  sense if you are new to HubSpot development all-together to  use the design manager for awhile until you’re used to  that, then move toward local dev after. The reason being - some things will make more sense to you that way.

There isn’t yet a standard setup for using webpack, babel, etc. with HubSpot everyone is still kinda experimenting with what the best way is. If you find a good setup be sure to share it, as many on here would love to know
